infos.value: Mach√©rie!
Father!
You are safe. I can rest assured at last.
King Oelde treated me as an honored guest.
More importantly, I ask that you protect Queen Helena and Prince Sterne...
Father...?
They are to be delivered to Fennes. A deal was struck with King Muraga not long ago.
Wh-why would you do that!? Why would you strike such a deal?
Oh, no... You never heard from Lynx?
From Lynx? No, she has been missing for quite some time.
What am I missing here?
Actually...
Muraga has been pulling the strings all along?
Alas... Is there no proof of this conspiracy?
Proof is hard to come by...
Muraga doesn't strike me as capable of such devious plots...
It is possible that Sadali gave him the idea.
Are there no means with which to reclaim Queen Helena and Lord Sterne?
Perhaps if you were to take their place in Fennes, an agreement could be reached.
...Then that is what I shall do.
No, I'll never submit to those terms.
Father!
But I'll persuade Muraga not to do them any harm.
It would not be wise for him to refuse my terms. We still have his daughter.
Father, about Muraga's daughter...
According to King Oelde...he doesn't have one.
What!?
...That fiend! What on earth are you planning?
Mont...
